description: PROPOSED OFFICE SPACE REFURBISHMENTS, INCLUDING WEST SIDE NEW WINDOWS, FLAT ROOF OVER EXISTING EAST SIDE CIRCULATION AREA WITH THREE NUMBER ROOF LIGHTS ON PROPOSED AND EXISTING REAR FLAT ROOFS AND LOW-LEVEL ENCLOSURE TO FORECOURT
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Drawing Number: 6930(P)011/Rev # (Block Plan) Dated 28.03.2022
Drawing no 6930(P)0100801/Rev #(LOCATION   Site Plan)Dated  28/03/2023
Drawing no. 6930(P)101-00/Rev#(Proposed Ground Floor Plan)Dated 28/03/2023,
Drawing no.6930(P) 202/Rev#(Proposed South Elevation Plan )Dated 28/03/2023
Drawing no. 6930(P)201/Rev#(Proposed West Elevation Plan)Dated 28/03/2023
Drawing no. 6930(P)101 - 01/Rev#(Proposed Roof Plan)Dated 28/03/2023 
Drawing no. 6930(P)200/Rev#(Proposed North Elevation) Dated 28/03/2023   
DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT Dated 3/29/2023

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Boundary Treatment - The Proposed low level brick wall colour dark grey to match adjacent property No.492 on the Proposed West Side Elevation Boundary as indicated on Drawing number 6930(P) 201/Rev# dated 28/03/2023  shall be carried out as the  details approved, and the development shall not be occupied / the use of the development hereby approved until the details approved and  the works to which this condition relates have been carried out in accordance with the approved details. The walls and fencing shall be permanently retained thereafter.

Condition : 5 - Obscured Glazing - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied, the proposed new windows in the Ground Floor West Side Elevation shall be double glazed, frosted glazing up to 1.7m with White framed uPVC and the Proposed new windows in the Rear Extension in the Ground Floor West Side Elevation to be frosted double glazed with White framed uPVC glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - No Use of Flat Roof  - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 7 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
http://www.planningportal.gov.uk/buildingregulations/buildingpolicyandlegislation/current legislation/partywallact.

Condition : 9 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF 2021, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   iii) The application was approved without delay.
subdivision_of_building: The proposal only concerns the ground floor offices.
